sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {bookDetail} from '../../Redux/Actions' import styles from './landing.module.scss' export function About({id}){ const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => dispatch(bookDetail(id)), []); const details = useSelector((state) => state.DetailBook) console.log('aca', details.bookFind, details.authorFind) return (

Book:

{details.bookFind.name}

{details.bookFind.isbn}

Author:

{details.authorFind.first_name}

{details.authorFind.last_name}

) }
